meanings.definition: A collection that is a part of a larger collection.
meanings.sent1: The subcollection of stamps in his album was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The library's subcollection of mystery novels is popular among readers.
meanings.sent3: His subcollection of action figures made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The subcollection of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: She carefully organized her subcollection of seashells by size and color.

meanings.definition: A subset of a larger collection.
meanings.sent1: The subcollection of toys in the box was colorful.
meanings.sent2: The museum's subcollection of ancient artifacts fascinated visitors.
meanings.sent3: His subcollection of baseball cards grew bigger every year.
meanings.sent4: The subcollection of clouds in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: She added a new subcollection of postcards to her travel memorabilia.
